special_text:
[+1]: Surveil 2. If you mill a nonland card this way, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
[0]: Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed creature's power to the battlefield.
[-2]: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature you control.
